meta.description: Officials conducted a "controlled release" of toxic chemicals from a derailed train on Monday. Residents in Ohio and Pennsylvania were still under mandatory evacuation orders after the train derailed near the border between the two states on Friday. CBS Pittsburgh's Erica Mokay reports.

title: Watch CBS Evening News: Derailed train prompts evacuations over explosion risk - Full show on CBS
